name: Plug It In (EOShadows)
description:
Plug that cord in!

This is a relaxing but sometimes challenging game all about plugging a cord into an outlet.  Take your time, control the plug, and maneuver through 8 levels in this short experience.

Made in a little over one week for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam 2022.

Made by:

  • EOShadows (Graphics, Coding, Sound Effects, Game Design)
  • Knocktane (Graphics, Coding, Music, Game Design)

Note: The lighting in the web version is a bit bright for some reason, but it's a lot better in the Windows version.
